hymn.title: When war is hot and fierce

layout.singingstanza: When war is hot and fierce, And Sa -- tan strong, Then firm -- ly trust God's Word And sing faith's song.

lyrics.stanza: When war is hot and fierce, And Satan strong, Then firmly trust God's Word And sing faith's song.
You need to shout but once, And you will win; Oh, do not shut your mouth And lose therein.
If pressed your spirit is And powerless, Pray thru the precious blood, Victorious.
The foe though fierce, you can Still fight with him; If you will keep your stand, You soon will win.
Therefore you must declare Christ's victory; The situation dark Soon changed will be.
